meanings.definition: One of a hundred equal parts.
meanings.sent1: I ate one hundredth of the cake.
meanings.sent2: She received the hundredth piece of candy.
meanings.sent3: The hundredth cookie in the jar always seems to disappear first.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as rare as finding the hundredth pearl in an oyster.
meanings.sent5: The hundredth drop of rain fell gently on the window pane.

meanings.sent1: The runner crossed the finish line in one hundredth place.
meanings.sent2: She celebrated her hundredth birthday with a big party.
meanings.sent3: The hundredth student in line got a special prize.
meanings.sent4: The hundredth star in the sky twinkled brightly that night.
meanings.sent5: Reaching the hundredth step, he finally reached the top of the mountain.
